text: (nabiye!) obava borukaraya yayi ovun pævasuvahot (oba ovunta “pin ho pav ho) mage kriyavange (phalavipaka) mata ayatya. (esema) obage kriyavange (phalavipaka) obata ayatya. mage kriyavanhi (phalavipakayan)gen oba athæra dæmu ayayi. obage kriyavanhi (phalavipakayan)gen ma athæra dæmu ayayi” yayi pavasanu (mænava)
